name: Jasmine Bubble Tea
desc: Jasmine bubble tea has a light floral taste. Jasmine green tea is a scented tea made by combining jasmine petals with green tea leaves.

name: Matcha Bubble Tea
desc: Matcha bubble tea is made from premium green tea powder. It has a slightly bitter taste and a strong green tea flavor.

name: Taro Bubble Tea
desc: Taro bubble tea has a creamy texture and a sweet, nutty flavor. It is made from taro root, which is a starchy root vegetable.

name: Honeydew Bubble Tea
desc: Honeydew bubble tea is a refreshing drink with a sweet, fruity flavor. It is made with honeydew melon juice and milk.

name: Passion Fruit Bubble Tea
desc: Passion fruit bubble tea is a tropical drink with a tangy and sweet taste. It is made with passion fruit juice and black tea.

name: Lychee Bubble Tea
desc: Lychee bubble tea has a sweet and fragrant taste. It is made with lychee juice and black tea, and has a fruity aroma.

name: Rose Bubble Tea
desc: Rose bubble tea is a fragrant and floral drink. It is made with rose water and black tea, and has a delicate and sweet taste.

name: Mango Bubble Tea
desc: Mango bubble tea is a fruity drink with a sweet and tropical taste. It is made with mango juice and black tea, and has a smooth texture.

name: Blueberry Bubble Tea
desc: Blueberry bubble tea is a refreshing drink with a sweet and tart taste. It is made with blueberry juice and green tea, and has a fruity aroma.

name: Ginger Bubble Tea
desc: Ginger bubble tea is a spicy and warming drink. It is made with fresh ginger juice and black tea, and has a slightly sweet taste.
